SEARCH
Package com.masri.TaskMangamentSystem.service

Class ProjectService

java.lang.Object
org.digitinary.taskmangament.service.ProjectService
@Service public class ProjectService extends Object
Service class for managing projects and their associated tasks. Provides methods for adding, retrieving, updating, and deleting projects. Author: Ahmad Almasri

    • ProjectService

      Constructs a ProjectService with the specified ProjectDao and UserService.
      Parameters:
      projectDao - the DAO used to interact with project data
      userService - the service used to interact with user data

  • Method Details

    • addProject

      public void addProject(Project project)
      Adds a new project if it does not already exist.
      Parameters:
      project - the project to be added
      Throws:
      DuplicateProjectsException - if a project with the same name already exists

    • getById

      public Project getById(int id)
      Retrieves a project by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the project
      Returns:
      the project with the specified ID
      Throws:
      ProjectNotFoundExecption - if no project is found with the given ID

    • updateProject

      public void updateProject(Project project) throws ProjectNotFoundExecption
      Updates an existing project.
      Parameters:
      project - the project with updated information
      Throws:
      ProjectNotFoundExecption - if the project to be updated does not exist
      ProjectNotFoundExecption - if a project with the new title already exists

    • deleteProject

      public void deleteProject(int id) throws ProjectNotFoundExecption
      Deletes a project by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the project to be deleted
      Throws:
      ProjectNotFoundExecption - if no project is found with the given ID

    • countTasksStatus

      public Map<Status,Long> countTasksStatus(int projectId) throws ProjectNotFoundExecption, ProjectNotContainsTaskException
      Counts the number of tasks in a project by their status.
      Parameters:
      projectId - the unique identifier of the project
      Returns:
      a map of task statuses and their counts
      Throws:
      ProjectNotFoundExecption - if the project is not found
      ProjectNotContainsTaskException - if the project does not contain tasks

    • countTasksByStatus

      public long countTasksByStatus(int projectId, Status status) throws ProjectNotFoundExecption, ProjectNotContainsTaskException
      Counts the number of tasks in a project by a specific status.
      Parameters:
      projectId - the unique identifier of the project
      status - the status to count tasks by
      Returns:
      the number of tasks with the specified status
      Throws:
      ProjectNotFoundExecption - if the project is not found
      ProjectNotContainsTaskException - if the project does not contain tasks
